source_sentence: 商棄尼華齒　　一髻大威德
translation: Śākyamuni's Flower Teeth: A Topknot of Great Might

source_sentence: 如是大藥叉　　常當而擁護
translation: Thus, the great yakṣa should always be embraced

source_sentence: 石女生子息　　胎孕咸增長
translation: the birth of a child from a heap of stones, the growth of a fetus and a pregnancy

source_sentence: 常加護彼人　　乃至壽命存
translation: always protects them for as long as they live

source_sentence: 丈夫常得勝　　恐怖鬪戰處
translation: a man who is always victorious and is afraid of the battlefield

source_sentence: 由此滿諸願　　由依淨信天
translation: thus fulfilling all vows based on pure faith in the heavens

source_sentence: 諸罪悉消滅　　由書此大明
translation: all sins are extinguished because of this great luminosity in writing

source_sentence: 諸佛常觀察　　大威德菩薩
translation: The buddhas are always observed by the bodhisattvas of great authority

source_sentence: 彼名稱增長　　福壽亦復然
translation: their reputation grows, and so does their life span

source_sentence: 財穀皆豐盛　　獲得悉無疑
translation: Wealth is abundant, and there is no doubt that it will be obtained.

source_sentence: 睡眠及覺悟　　悉皆得安樂
translation: drowsiness and awakening are all attained with well-being

source_sentence: 怨家及鬼神　　皆不能沮壞
translation: Neither enemies nor spirits can be stifled.

source_sentence: 當於鬪戰時　　常皆獲得勝
translation: always prevails when engaged in combat

source_sentence: 若修密言時　　此護最為勝
translation: If you practice the esoteric arts, this protection is most superior

source_sentence: 安樂修諸明　　悉得無障礙
translation: the cultivation of awarenesses of comfort and well-being is fully attained without obstruction

source_sentence: 一切密言教　　悉皆得成就
translation: all the teachings of the esoteric school are fully achieved

source_sentence: 成入一切壇　　速成三昧耶
translation: samaya of accomplishing rapid entry into all altars

source_sentence: 乃至於來世　　諸佛皆委寄
translation: Until a future life, all buddhas are entrusted with their lives.

source_sentence: 由持此大護　　諸吉祥皆滿
translation: By maintaining this great protection, all good fortune is complete

source_sentence: 意願悉成就　　由纔書此明
translation: all wishes are fulfilled because of this insight, which is written with a little effort

source_sentence: 一切樂豐盛　　安樂而捨壽
translation: all pleasures abound, and he lives a life of peace and comfort.

source_sentence: 必生於善趣　　欲生極樂國
translation: must be born in a good destiny, desiring to be born in the Land of Ultimate Bliss

source_sentence: 持帶此明王　　決定無疑惑
translation: to carry this king of illumination with certainty and without doubt

source_sentence: 鬪諍於言訟　　戰陣大怖中
translation: quarrels and disputes in speech and in the midst of great fear in battle

source_sentence: 諸怖皆遠離　　如佛誠言說
translation: all fears are abandoned, as the Buddha has sincerely explained

source_sentence: 常獲宿命智　　生生皆無疑
translation: always attains knowledge of past lives, and all births are without doubt

source_sentence: 國王皆歡喜　　及後宮眷屬
translation: The king was overjoyed, and his retinue was rejoiced.

source_sentence: 盡皆常恭敬　　常與善人和
translation: always respectful, always in harmony with good people

source_sentence: 皆悉生憐愍　　并人及與天
translation: they all have compassion for each other, humans and gods alike.

source_sentence: 令彼作加護　　常恒於晝夜
translation: to cause them to provide protection, always during the day and night

source_sentence: 大護成就明　　等正覺所說
translation: Mahāprajñāpāramitā: taught by the perfectly enlightened

source_sentence: 爾時薄伽婆即說隨求大護明王大心陀羅尼曰。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān addressed the Suiqiu Daju Mingwang da xintuoluoni, saying.

source_sentence: 若有人以如來身明陀羅尼句。
translation: "Suppose someone uses the dhāraṇī phrase of the Tathāgata's body and insight.

source_sentence: 作加持救濟攝受加護。
translation: It's a blessing, a rescue, a gathering, and a protection.

source_sentence: 能作息災作吉祥法。
translation: It's an auspicious way to calm disasters and create good fortune.

source_sentence: 遮止讁罰成大加護。
translation: It's a great blessing that prevents harsh punishment.

source_sentence: 若人壽命欲盡。
translation: Suppose a person's life expectancy is about to end.

source_sentence: 誦此真言復得延命增壽。
translation: Reciting this true teaching will again prolong his life and increase his life expectancy.

source_sentence: 久久命存常獲安樂得大念持。
translation: Long after that, his life will remain forever peaceful and he'll attain great mindfulness.

source_sentence: 若以金剛杵纔念誦加持。
translation: If he recites it with a vajra pounder and chants it with energy, then he'll be able to extend his life and increase his life.

source_sentence: 或有非命患大疾者。
translation: Perhaps someone who's not alive suffers from a serious illness.

source_sentence: 皆得解脫。
translation: They'll all be liberated.

source_sentence: 一切疾病皆得除滅。
translation: All illnesses are removed.

source_sentence: 長患病者誦此真言。
translation: Recite this true chant for someone who's been sick for a long time.

source_sentence: 加持袈裟角拂彼病人便即除差。
translation: He then brushes the corner of his robe against the sick person, and he'll be freed from them.

source_sentence: 日日誦持者。
translation: Reciting it day after day, he'll attain great intelligence, might, and diligence.

source_sentence: 得大聰慧威力大勤勇辯才成就。
translation: He'll attain great intelligence, might, and power, and the accomplishment of great diligence and eloquence.

source_sentence: 一切罪障定受業報悉皆消滅。
translation: All the hindrances of sins and the results of actions received in meditation will all cease.

source_sentence: 一切佛菩薩。
translation: All the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 并天龍藥叉等。
translation: gods, dragons, yakṣas, and so forth.

source_sentence: 於受持陀羅尼者。
translation: Those who receive and uphold the dhāraṇī will cause their energy to enter their bodies and increase their authority.

source_sentence: 當令精氣入身增加威力。
translation: They'll cause their energy to enter their bodies and increase their power.

source_sentence: 身心常得喜悅。
translation: They'll always be delighted in body and mind.

source_sentence: 大梵此大明王大護陀羅尼。
translation: "Mahābrahma, this is the great luminous king's great protective dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 若有乃至傍生禽獸耳根所聞。
translation: If there are even animals and birds in the world that hear it in their ears, then they'll all attain unsurpassed bodhi.

source_sentence: 彼等悉皆於無上菩提永不退轉。
translation: They'll all attain unsurpassed enlightenment and never turn back.

source_sentence: 何況淨信善男子善女人。
translation: How could it be any more so than pure faithful good men and good women?

source_sentence: 苾芻苾芻尼鄔波索迦鄔波斯迦。
translation: Bhikṣu, bhikṣuṇī, and upāsaka, upāsaka.

source_sentence: 國王王子婆羅門剎利及諸餘類。
translation: Kings, princes, brāhmaṇas, bhadras, and all the rest of them.

source_sentence: 一聞此大隨求大護陀羅尼。
translation: As soon as they hear this great following, they seek the great protective dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 聞已深心淨信恭敬書寫讀誦。
translation: After hearing it, he deeply and purely believes in it, respectfully writes it down, and recites it.

source_sentence: 生殷重心修習。
translation: They give rise to ardent attention and cultivation.

source_sentence: 為他廣演流布。
translation: He teaches it widely for others and disseminates it.

source_sentence: 大梵悉皆遠離八種非命。
translation: "The great Brahmās all part with the eight kinds of wrong livelihood.

source_sentence: 彼人身中不生疾病。
translation: No illness will arise in their person.

source_sentence: 不被火毒刀杖蠱毒壓禱呪詛諸惡藥法之所損害。
translation: They won't be harmed by fire, knife, stick, poison, pressure, prayer, curse, or any other bad medicine or dharma.

source_sentence: 不被身痛頭痛。
translation: They won't suffer from body pain or headaches.

source_sentence: 及諸瘧病一日二日三日四日乃至七日。
translation: They'll suffer from malaria for a day, two days, three days, four days, or even seven days.

source_sentence: 及癲癎病悉不能為患。
translation: They won't be afflicted by epilepsy or seizures.

source_sentence: 正念睡眠正念覺悟。
translation: He's rightly mindful, sleeps, and awakens with right mindfulness.

source_sentence: 證大涅槃。
translation: They'll realize great nirvāṇa.

source_sentence: 現世得大富貴自在。
translation: In the present life, they'll attain great wealth and power and be at ease.

source_sentence: 所生之處於彼彼處常得宿命。
translation: Where he's born, he'll always have a former life in that place or another place.

source_sentence: 一切人天皆悉愛敬容儀端正。
translation: All humans and gods will love and respect them, and their appearance will be correct.

source_sentence: 一切地獄餓鬼傍生皆得解脫。
translation: All hells, hungry ghosts, and animals are liberated.

source_sentence: 猶如日輪以光明照曜一切有情。
translation: It's like the sun-wheel shining brightly on all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 譬如月輪以甘露灌灑一切有情身。
translation: It's like the moon wheel that sprinkles the bodies of all sentient beings with sweet dew.

source_sentence: 得適悅其人。
translation: It then pleases them.

source_sentence: 以法甘露遍入一切有情心相續中。
translation: With the sweet dew of the Dharma, it enters the mental continuum of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 皆令滋澤歡喜。
translation: It nourishes them all and makes them rejoice.

source_sentence: 一切諸惡藥又羅剎。
translation: All the bad medicines and rājas are nourished and delighted.

source_sentence: 步多。
translation: Bactria.

source_sentence: 畢[口*(隸-木+士)]多。
translation: Piṭṭhita [kou*(lagi-wood+shi)].

source_sentence: 畢舍遮。
translation: piśācāḥ.

source_sentence: 癲癎鬼。
translation: He's a convalescent demon.

source_sentence: 拏枳寧諸魅。
translation: The demons of Nāgârjuna.

source_sentence: 毘那也迦等。
translation: Vinaya-kāśyapa and so forth.

source_sentence: 悉皆以此大隨求大護威力不能侵惱。
translation: They all use this great power of following and seeking and great protection to prevent them from being disturbed.

source_sentence: 若來逼近。
translation: If they come near, they'll remember this great guardian luminous king.

source_sentence: 憶念此大護明王。
translation: He'll remember this great guardian luminous king.

source_sentence: 則一切惡心之類。
translation: Then, all kinds of evil-minded people will become joyous.

source_sentence: 於持誦之人發生歡喜。
translation: They rejoice in the person who recites it.

source_sentence: 受教而去。
translation: They'll accept the teaching and leave.

source_sentence: 由此大隨求大護明王威力。
translation: Thus, he greatly follows the authority of the great guardian luminous king.

source_sentence: 終無怨敵怖畏。
translation: He'll never be feared by enemies.

source_sentence: 是諸怨敵不能凌突。
translation: Such resentful enemies can't overpower them.

source_sentence: 或若有人。
translation: Suppose there's a person.

source_sentence: 於國王大臣婆羅門長者處。
translation: At the place of the king's minister, a Brāhmaṇa elder.

source_sentence: 所犯愆過罪合當死殺者。
translation: He commits an offense that's worthy of death.

source_sentence: 持刀劍臨刑之時。
translation: When he's about to be executed, he'll carry a sword.

source_sentence: 若纔憶念此大護明王。
translation: If they even think about this great guardian of the luminous king.

source_sentence: 其刀片片斷壞猶如微塵。
translation: Pieces of his sword break off like tiny pieces of dust.

source_sentence: 其人當彼之時。
translation: At that point, that person...

source_sentence: 得悟一切法平等。
translation: Attaining awakening, he realizes the equality of all things.

source_sentence: 獲大念力。
translation: He attains the power of great mindfulness.

source_sentence: 爾時如來說伽陀曰。
translation: At that point, the Tathāgata says, "Gata!

source_sentence: 此大護加持　　清淨滅諸罪
translation: "This great protective empowerment purifies and extinguishes sins.

source_sentence: 能作慧吉祥　　增長諸功德
translation: auspicious wisdom that produces virtues that increase

source_sentence: 能滿諸吉慶　　除滅不吉祥
translation: able to fulfill all auspicious intentions and remove inauspicious ones

source_sentence: 能見妙好夢　　能淨諸惡夢
translation: able to see beautiful dreams and purify bad dreams

source_sentence: 此大明大護　　護丈夫女人
translation: this great luminosity and great care, which protects husbands and women

source_sentence: 曠野及險怖　　剎那得解脫
translation: wilderness and dangers are instantly liberated

source_sentence: 獲諸所欲願　　如正等覺說
translation: to obtain all desired vows as taught by the correct enlightenment

source_sentence: 若行失道路　　念此大明王
translation: if one loses the way in one's practice, think of this great luminous king

source_sentence: 速疾得正道　　得殊勝飲食
translation: quickly attains the right path and obtains excellent food and drink

source_sentence: 以身口意業　　先時作諸罪
translation: sins committed in the past with the activities of body, speech, and thought

source_sentence: 所作不善業　　纔憶此明故
translation: because of the unwholesome activity that is created, one can only recall this insight

source_sentence: 悉皆得消滅　　書寫及受持
translation: all are extinguished, written down, and memorized

source_sentence: 轉讀并念誦　　及為他宣說
translation: to read, recite, and expound for others

source_sentence: 諸法皆通達　　如是得法味
translation: all dharmas are comprehended Thus is the taste of the Dharma obtained

source_sentence: 諸罪即消滅　　心意所樂求
translation: all sins are immediately extinguished, and the mind seeks what it wants.

source_sentence: 諸事皆成就　　一切死怖中
translation: all things are accomplished, and in the midst of all fears of death...

source_sentence: 畢獲而救護　　王官及水火
translation: to rescue the king's officers, water, and fire after obtaining them

source_sentence: 霜雹并劫賊　　鬪戰及言訟
translation: frost, hail, and robbers, fights, and arguments

source_sentence: 利牙爪獸難　　一切悉消融
translation: sharp teeth, claws, and difficult animals all melt away

source_sentence: 由誦洛叉遍　　速成就此明
translation: by reciting the lakṣa pārijātaka, this knowledge is quickly attained

source_sentence: 一切諸佛說　　稱誦令歡喜
translation: all buddha teachings, chanting them, and making them rejoice

source_sentence: 滿菩提資糧　　一切所住處
translation: full accumulation of enlightenment all the abodes of bodhisattvas

source_sentence: 若用此大明　　而作於加持
translation: if you use this great luminosity to apply blessings

source_sentence: 欲作諸事業　　自他利益事
translation: desires to undertake various works for the benefit of self and others

source_sentence: 任運得成就　　以大護無疑
translation: freely attains success by means of great protection without doubt

source_sentence: 大梵汝當知　　我今復宣說
translation: Brahmā, you should know that I will now again expound...

source_sentence: 為患重病人　　應作四方壇
translation: a four-sided altar should be built for a person who is seriously ill

source_sentence: 瞿摩和土泥　　用五色粉畫
translation: gompa and clay painted with five colors of powder

source_sentence: 而作曼荼羅　　四瓶安四角
translation: and make a maṇḍala with four vials placed at the four corners

source_sentence: 智者依儀軌　　壇上散諸花
translation: a wise man follows the rules of propriety and scatters flowers on the altar

source_sentence: 應燒殊勝香　　及種種飲食
translation: excellent incense and various foods should be burned

source_sentence: 人見令淨信　　如是用香花
translation: people see and are made to believe in purity thus using flowers and incense

source_sentence: 依法而奉獻　　四角插四箭
translation: to dedicate oneself according to the teachings, inserting four arrows in four corners

source_sentence: 用五色縷纏　　令病者澡浴
translation: to bathe a sick person in a bath made of five colored tissues

source_sentence: 身著清淨衣　　遍體而塗香
translation: wearing pure clothing and rubbing incense all over his body

source_sentence: 引入壇中心　　面對東方坐
translation: introduction of the altar center facing east

source_sentence: 爾時持明者　　先誦此大明
translation: At that point, the bearer of the vision first recites this great vision.

source_sentence: 令滿於七遍　　自加持己身
translation: make it complete seven times... by applying oneself to the body

source_sentence: 次誦三七遍　　加持於病者
translation: chanting three times seven times next, bestowing blessings on the sick person

source_sentence: 由誦此大護　　諸疾皆息除
translation: By reciting this great protection, all illnesses are prevented.

source_sentence: 即取一水瓶　　盛香花飲食
translation: i.e., take a vial of water and drink fragrant flowers

source_sentence: 七遍作加護　　東方遠棄擲
translation: seven times it is applied as protection, and the east is cast far away

source_sentence: 次取南方瓶　　花香食如教
translation: next, he takes the southern vase and eats the flowers and scents as taught

source_sentence: 准前誦七遍　　遠棄擲南方
translation: recite the above seven times, casting off the south as far as possible

source_sentence: 次用西方瓶　　花香及飲食
translation: Second Use Western Vase Floral Scents and Beverages

source_sentence: 依前加持法　　北方亦復然
translation: based on the previous ritual, the northern direction is likewise.

source_sentence: 爾時持誦者　　仰面向上方
translation: At that point, the person who recites the scripture looks up and faces upward.

source_sentence: 誦此明一遍　　成最勝加持
translation: recite this teaching once, and it will become the most distinguished blessing

source_sentence: 大梵作是已　　一切苦悉除
translation: "After the Brahman has done this, all suffering is completely removed.

source_sentence: 如是加持法　　釋師子所說
translation: this kind of protective dharma is explained by the lion of the Śākyas

source_sentence: 一切諸法中　　無有能與比
translation: among all dharmas, there is nothing that compares with it

source_sentence: 三界中勝護　　彼人無夭死
translation: He is protected in the three realms, and there is no premature death.

source_sentence: 無老亦無病　　怨憎離別苦
translation: neither old age nor illness, and the suffering of separation from what is disliked

source_sentence: 若能在理觀　　心離於憂苦
translation: if one can observe in principle, the mind is free from sorrow and suffering

source_sentence: 及離受蘊苦　　爓魔眾供養
translation: and free from the suffering of the sensory aggregates, flame the offerings of Māra.

source_sentence: 爓魔之法王　　恭敬而承事
translation: to venerate and serve the king of the Dharma who hates Māra

source_sentence: 告彼持明者　　速往於天趣
translation: tell him to quickly depart for the heavenly realm

source_sentence: 由此大明故　　地獄盡無餘
translation: because of this great luminosity, hell is exhausted without remainder

source_sentence: 則乘妙宮殿　　具威至天上
translation: then you will ride in the wonderful palace, and you will attain heaven with great authority.

source_sentence: 一切人及天　　藥叉羅剎眾
translation: all humans and gods, the hermits and rājas, and the bunched seeds

source_sentence: 悉皆而供養　　常當獲此福
translation: making offerings to all of them will always obtain this merit

source_sentence: 是故常受持　　金剛手菩薩
translation: Therefore, it is always upheld by Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 祕密藥叉將　　帝釋舍脂后
translation: General of the Secret Yakṣa Indra after Śākyamuni

source_sentence: 訶利帝母眾　　半支迦藥叉
translation: Hāritī Mūlasarvâstivāda Pancīyakṣa

source_sentence: 護世大威德　　日月及星宿
translation: guardian of the world's great authority, the sun, moon, and stars

source_sentence: 執曜猛惡者　　一切大龍王
translation: (Skt. śrāvaka), who wields fierce and evil, all great dragon kings

source_sentence: 諸天并仙眾　　阿蘇羅及龍
translation: gods and sages, asuras and dragons

source_sentence: 金翅乾闥婆　　緊那摩睺羅
translation: Kanakamuni, the golden-winged gandharva, and Kāṇḍamahoraga

source_sentence: 由書帶此明　　恒常而隨逐
translation: from writing, this insight is carried on a constant basis and followed

source_sentence: 由依法誦持　　獲得大榮盛
translation: By chanting and maintaining the precepts in accordance with the Dharma, one obtains great prosperity

source_sentence: 爾時世尊說是經已。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān spoke this sūtra.

source_sentence: 諸大菩薩大聲聞眾。
translation: The great bodhisattvas, the great śrāvakas, and Brahmakāyika gods, all the gods, dragons, yakṣas, asuras, gandharvas, tulips, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, and nonhumans.

source_sentence: 及梵天王一切天龍藥叉阿蘇羅乾闥婆蘖路茶緊那羅摩呼羅伽人非人等。
translation: Brahmakāyika, all the gods, dragons, yakṣas, asuras, gandharvas, tshogs, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, and nonhumans.

source_sentence: 皆大歡喜信受奉行。
translation: They all rejoiced greatly and believed and handed it down.

普遍光明清淨熾盛如意寶印心無能勝大明王大隨求陀羅尼經卷下　天阿蘇羅藥叉等　　來聽法者應至心　擁護佛法使長存　　各各勤行世尊教　諸有聽徒來至此　　或在地上或居空　常於人世起慈心　　日夜自身依法住　願諸世界常安隱　　無邊福智益群生　所有罪業并消除　　遠離眾苦歸圓寂　恒用戒香塗瑩體　　常持定服以資身　菩提妙花遍莊嚴　　隨所住處常安樂曩謨薩嚩怛他(去聲引)誐跢(去聲引)南(引一)曩謨曩莫(二)薩嚩沒馱冐(引)地薩多嚩(二合三)沒馱達摩僧(去聲)契(引)毘藥(二合四)唵(引五)尾補攞蘖陛(六)尾補攞尾麼(鼻聲下同)黎(上聲七)惹(子曳切)野蘖陛(八)嚩日囉(二合)入嚩(二合引)攞蘖陛(九)誐底(丁以切)誐賀寧(十)誐誐曩尾戍(引)陀寧(十一)薩嚩播(引)跛尾戍(引)陀(去聲)寧(十二)唵(引十三)虞拏(鼻聲下同)嚩底(十四)誐誐哩抳(尼澄切十五)儗(疑以切)哩儗哩(十六)誐麼哩誐麼哩(十七)虐賀虐賀(十八)蘖誐(引)哩蘖誐(引)哩(十九)誐誐哩誐誐哩(二十)儼婆(上聲)哩儼婆(去聲)哩(二十一)誐底誐底(二十二)誐麼[寧*頁]誐[口*(隸-木+士)](二十三)虞(上聲下同)嚕虞嚕(二十四)虞嚕抳(尼整切二十五)佐黎(二十六)阿(上聲)佐黎(二十七)母佐黎(二十八)惹曳(二十九)尾惹曳(三十)薩嚩婆野尾誐帝(三十一)蘖婆三(去聲)婆囉抳(尼整切三十二)悉哩悉哩(三十三)弭哩弭哩(三十四)岐哩岐哩(三十五)三滿跢(引)迦囉灑(二合)抳(三十六)薩嚩設咄嚕(二合)鉢羅(二合)末他(上聲)[寧*頁](三十七)囉吃灑(二合)囉吃灑(二合)麼(上聲)麼(某甲)薩嚩薩多嚩(二合引)難(上聲引)佐(三十八)尾哩尾哩(三十九)尾誐跢(引)嚩囉拏(四十)婆(去聲)野曩(引)捨[寧*頁](四十一)蘇(上聲)哩蘇哩(四十二)唧哩劍麼(上聲)黎(四十三)尾麼黎(四十四)惹曳(四十五)尾惹曳(四十六)惹夜(引)嚩奚(四十七)惹野嚩底(四十八)婆(上聲)誐嚩底囉怛曩(二合)麼(上聲)矩吒麼(引)邏(引)馱哩(四十九)麼護尾尾馱尾唧怛囉(二合五十)吠(引)灑嚕(引)跛馱(引)哩抳(五十一)婆(上聲)誐嚩底摩賀(引)尾儞也(二合引)埿(上聲)尾(五十二)囉吃灑(二合)囉吃灑(二合)麼麼(某甲五十三)薩嚩薩多嚩(二合引)難(上聲)佐(五十四)三滿跢薩嚩怛囉(二合五十五)薩嚩播(引)跛尾戍(引)馱[寧*頁](五十六)戶嚕戶嚕(五十七)諾乞察(二合)怛囉(二合)麼(引)邏馱(引)哩抳(五十八)囉吃灑(二合)囉吃灑(二合)[牟*含]麼麼(某甲五十九)阿曩(引)他(上聲)寫(引六十)怛囉(二合引)拏(引)跛囉(引)耶拏寫(引六十一)跛哩謨(引)佐野冥(引六十二)薩嚩耨契(引)毘藥(二合六十三)戰尼戰尼(六十四)戰膩[寧*頁]吠(引)誐嚩底(六十五)薩嚩訥瑟吒(二合)[寧*頁]嚩(引)囉抳(六十六)設咄嚕(二合)博吃叉(二合)鉢囉(二合)末他(上聲)[寧*頁](六十七)尾惹野嚩(引)呬[寧*頁](六十八)戶嚕戶嚕(六十九)母嚕母嚕(七十)祖嚕祖嚕(七十一)阿(去聲引)欲播(引)攞[寧*頁](七十二)蘇(上聲)囉嚩囉末陀[寧*頁](七十三)薩嚩泥(上聲)嚩跢布(引)呲(紫以切)帝(七十四)地哩地哩(七十五)三滿跢(引)嚩路(引)枳帝(七十六)鉢囉(二合)陛鉢囉(二合)陛(七十七)蘇鉢囉婆尾秫第(七十八)薩嚩播(引)跛尾戍(引)馱寗(七十九)達囉達囉(八十)達囉抳馱囉達[口*(隸-木+士)](八十一)蘇(上聲)母蘇母(八十二)嚕嚕佐黎(八十三)佐(引)攞耶努瑟鵮(二合引八十四)布(引)囉野銘阿(去聲引)苫(去聲引八十五)室哩(二合引)嚩補陀難惹野劍麼黎(八十六)吃史(二合)抳吃史(二合)抳(八十七)嚩囉泥嚩囉能(引)矩勢(八十八)唵(引)鉢納麼(二合)尾秫第(八十九)戍馱野戍(引)馱野(九十)舜(入聲)第(九十一)跛囉跛囉(九十二)鼻哩鼻哩(九十三)步嚕步嚕(九十四)懵(去聲)誐攞尾舜(入聲)第(九十五)跛尾怛囉(二合)穆棄(九十六)渴(袪蘖切)儗抳渴儗抳(九十七)佉(上聲)囉佉囉(九十八)入嚩(二合)里多始渴[口*(隸-木+士)](九十九)三(上聲下同)滿多鉢囉(二合)娑(上聲)哩跢(引)嚩婆(去聲引)悉多秫第(入聲一百)入嚩(二合)攞入嚩(二合)攞(一合)薩嚩泥(上聲)嚩誐拏三麼迦囉灑(二合)抳(二)薩底也(二合)嚩帝跢囉怛囉哆(引)哩野[牟*含](三)曩(引)誐尾[口*路]枳帝(四)攞護攞護(五)戶弩戶弩(六)乞史(二合)抳乞史(二合)抳(七)薩嚩擬囉(二合)賀薄乞灑(二合)抳(八)氷(畢孕切)誐里氷誐里(九)祖母祖母(十)蘇母蘇母(十一)祖母佐[口*(隸-木+士)](十二)多囉多囉(十三)曩(引)誐尾路枳[寧*頁]跢囉野覩[牟*含](十四)婆誐嚩底阿瑟吒(二合)摩賀婆曳毘藥(二
